name: Dyin To Live
description:
Welcome to "Dyin’ to Live", a wickedly fun puzzle game where your host's demise is your key to survival. Cause a pandemic among unsuspecting nurses, oblivious policemen, adorable dogs, and more as you uncover each character's infectious skills. But spread carefully – while your abilities infect new victims, they also bring death to the entire hive mind. It's an infectious power trip with a deadly price!

Dive into 80+ challenging, yet satisfying levels as you learn the mechanics of your host characters.

Track how fast your epidemic spreads with viral high scores! Will your viral intellect outlast your friends in this game of life and death? Time to find out!


Here’s what players have to say about it:

“These [puzzles] are wonderfully done. A nice smooth difficulty scale... Some left me stuck for a while, and it was very satisfying solving them.”

“Awww the police not shooting infected dogs is way too cute”
